title: Where are the Playground options Camera? Under More I only see sphere, lens, slomo, no photobooth
content: I followed the instructions to find the Photobooth and 2D and 3D sticker options, by going to Camera > More > Playground. But there's no Playground category under More - only sphere, lens, slow motion, and settings. I just bought the phone, and updated the software to the most current. Thanks!
